```{r}
#| echo: false

default_chunk_hook  <- knitr::knit_hooks$get("chunk")

latex_font_size <- c("Huge", "huge", "LARGE", "Large", 
                     "large", "normalsize", "small", 
                     "footnotesize", "scriptsize", "tiny")

knitr::knit_hooks$set(chunk = function(x, options) {
  x <- default_chunk_hook(x, options)
  if(options$size %in% latex_font_size) {
    paste0("\n \\", options$size, "\n\n", 
      x, 
      "\n\n \\normalsize"
    )
  } else {
    x
  }
})

```

# Ingredients
```{r}
#| echo: false
#| results: 'asis'
ingredients.all = vector()
for(i in 1:length(meals)){
  meal=read_html(meals[i])
  ingredients.section=html_element(meal, "#ingredients")
  ingredients=html_elements(ingredients.section, 'li')
  formatted_list <- paste("-", html_text(ingredients))
  cat(formatted_list, sep = "\n")
}


```

# Recipe One
```{r}
#| echo: false
#| results: 'asis'
meal=read_html(meals[2])
image.element=html_element(meal, '.img-fluid')
source.link=html_attr(image.element, "src")
image.url=paste("website/", source.link, sep="")
cat(paste('<img src="', image.url, '" style="width: 50%; height: auto;">'))
instructions.section=html_element(meal, "#instructions")
instructions=html_elements(instructions.section, 'li')
formatted_list <- paste("1.", html_text(instructions))
cat(formatted_list, sep = "\n")
```
